reviewText: Ghostwatch was kinda stupid but interesting as the British version of the Orson Welles War of the Worlds broadcast.  The Stone Tape wasn't bad; it too is a classic of British television, with an interesting story premise.
Asked before I bought this if both could be watched in my Blu-ray and told they would. First movie no problem, 2nd however cannot be viewed on US player.
Could only watch "Ghost Watch" because the other one wouldn't play because of the encoding.  Ghost Watch, however, was very good.
